nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'activeTracers' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_activeTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'activeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_surface_salinity_monthly_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, apply monthly salinity restoring

nml_option.name: config_salinity_restoring_constant_piston_velocity
nml_option.description: maximum allowable difference between surface salinity and climatology

nml_option.name: config_salinity_restoring_max_difference
nml_option.description: maximum allowable difference between surface salinity and climatology

package.name: activeTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include active tracers.

package.name: activeTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the active tracer group.

package.name: activeTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the active tracer group.

package.name: activeTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the active tracer group.

package.name: activeTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the active tracer group.

package.name: activeTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the active tracer group.

package.name: activeTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the active tracer group.

var.name: temperature
var.description: potential temperature

var.name: temperatureTend
var.description: time tendency of potential temperature

var.name: salinityTend
var.description: time tendency of salinity measured as change in practical salinity units per second

var.name: temperatureSurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of temperature through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: salinitySurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of salinity through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: temperatureSurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of temperature through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: salinitySurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of salinity through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: temperatureSurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of temperature that is ignored coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.

var.name: salinitySurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of salinity that is ignroed coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.

var.name: nonLocalTemperatureSurfaceFlux
var.description: total flux of temperature (including thickness contributions) through ocean surface

var.name: nonLocalSalinitySurfaceFlux
var.description: total flux of salinity (including thickness contributions) through ocean surface

var.name: temperaturePistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which temperature is restored to temperatureSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: salinityPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which salinity is restored to salinitySurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: temperatureSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by temperaturePistonVelocity.

var.name: salinitySurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by salinityPistonVelocity.

var.name: temperatureInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which temperature is restored to temperatureInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: salinityInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which salinity is restored to salinityInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: temperatureInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by temperatureInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: salinityInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by salinityInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: temperatureExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of temperature

var.name: salinityExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of salinity

var.name: temperatureIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, temperature is reset to temperature * temperatureIdealAgeMask, valid values of temperatureIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: salinityIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, salinity is reset to salinity * salinityIdealAgeMask, valid values of salinityIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: temperatureTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, temperature is reset to TTDMask, valid values of temperatureTTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: salinityTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, salinity is reset to salinityTTDMask, valid values of salinityTTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: surfaceSalinityMonthlyClimatologyValue
var.description: monthly surface salinity climatology interpolated to current timestep
